text: The Villiers Diamond is a 1938 British crime film directed by Bernard Mainwaring and starring Edward Ashley, Evelyn Ankers and Frank Birch.BFI.org The screenplay concerns a man who is threatened with scandal when he accidentally acquires a stolen diamond. ==Cast== * Edward Ashley - Captain Dawson * Evelyn Ankers - Joan Raymond * Frank Birch - Silas Wade * Liam Gaffney - Alan O'Connel * Leslie Harcourt - Henry Barker * Julie Suedo - Mrs Forbes * Sybil Brooke - Miss Waring * Bill Shine - Joe * Margaret Davidge - Mrs. Benson * Anita Sharp-Bolster - Mlle. Dulac ==References== ==External links== * Category:1938 films Category:British films Category:1938 crime films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Bernard Mainwaring Category:20th Century Fox films Category:British black-and-white films Category:British crime films
title: The Villiers Diamond
